revised_title: Anatomical and Physiological Relationships of Thyroid and Parathyroid Glands in Vertebrates
tldr: This study examines the development and function of thyroid and parathyroid glands in various vertebrates, highlighting their intimate anatomical and physiological relationships in mammals. The author also discusses the effects of thyroidectomy and parathyroidectomy on the pituitary body, suggesting that the pituitary is an integral part of the thyroid-parathyroid apparatus.
